_comment_chains: Chain of the target; has to be chain A! (so far no working implementation for multi-chain targets)
_comment_fixed_positions: Comma-separated positions (1-based) to lock sequence AND structure (e.g., '1-3,10'). Use for catalytic sites or critical residues. Independent of floating setting.
_comment_template_positions: Comma-separated positions (1-based) to lock structure but redesign sequence (e.g., '15-20'). Use to preserve secondary structure geometry. Independent of floating setting.
_comment_sequence_positions: Comma-separated positions (1-based) to lock sequence but allow movement (e.g., '5-8'). Use for binding motifs that need spatial optimization. Independent of floating setting.
_comment_position_hierarchy: Position priority: fixed_positions (seq+struct) > template_positions (struct only) > sequence_positions (seq only) > redesign (full freedom). Each position belongs to exactly one category. Disulfide pairs are automatically added to fixed_positions (if floating=false) or sequence_positions (if floating=true).
_comment_disulfide_pairs: 0-based numbering! Placed Cysteins orverride potential scaffold fix! List of cysteine residue index pairs to form disulfide bonds (0-based, binder only). Example: [[0, 9], [3, -1]] creates bonds between positions 0-9 and 3-last. Empty list = auto-generate pairs. Use -1 for second position to automatically select the last residue of the binder.
_comment_disulfide_num: Number of disulfide bonds to promote during design
